title: Choujin Gakuen Gowcaizer: The Voltage Fighters
synopsis: It is the dawn of the 21st century. The cataclysmic earthquake which reduced half of Tokyo to a broken landscape of twisted steel and shattered stone was only the first sign of the impending apocalypse.
staff: [['Oobari, Masami', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Character Design', ' Chief Animation Director']], ['Mima, Masafumi', ['Sound Director']], ['Endoh, Masaaki', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Touma, Yumi', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
